    • Uses of Order in bll

      Methods in bll that return types with arguments of type Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashSet<Order> Restaurant.getOrderList()
      getter for the lsit of orders
      java.util.HashMap<Order,java.util.List<MenuItem>> Restaurant.getOrderMap()
      getter for the map of orders, which contains the list of ordered meu items
      Methods in bll with parameters of type Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Restaurant.addOrderToList(Order order)
      This method adds the new order to the list, notifying the chef about it and passing the order as a String.
      double Restaurant.computeOrderPrice(Order order)
      computing the total price of the order it is iverriden from the IRestaurantProcessing interface
      double IRestaurantProcessing.computeOrderPrice(Order order)
      computes the total price of an ordered, which has to be paid by the client
      void Restaurant.createOrder(Order order, java.util.List<MenuItem> menuItem)
      the method for creating an order, made by the waiter, and adding to the list uses the Design by Contract method (assert)
      void IRestaurantProcessing.createOrder(Order order, java.util.List<MenuItem> menuItem)
      creates a new order, required by the waiter, notifying the chef
      void Restaurant.deleteOrder(Order order)
      in case of generate bill itt deletes the order
      Method parameters in bll with type arguments of type Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      setter for the order list
      void Restaurant.setOrderMap(java.util.HashMap<Order,java.util.List<MenuItem>> orderMap)
